lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What a hilarious and unexpected video.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. We totally just saw that just now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you can go ahead and hold that one up right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was picturing a thing that you hang a backpack on.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Me, too. I was like, "That's just a hanger." (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what TikTok is, Sam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm [Inaudible] to the German in Raiders of the Lost Arc, when he comes in going like, "Good evening, Fräulein."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Laura, we brought some of the stuff with us tonight, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But yes, we do have some stuff to show off tonight! So Sam, obviously, Sam has that fabulous hoodie.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know if you can see that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on, I was going to get to the pin!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it's too fricking late now! Hold up the dang pin!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, what a lovely pin! And look at your hoodie!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it's got a back to it, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is the OG Kit Buss art, the original art.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have drink wear! Ooh! We have-- you are holding the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we also have our amazing Yasha blanket, oh yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Look at this! We got, we got.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that might be everything, and you already held up the backpack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! And there's other things, yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, there's a Critical Role journal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, wait, what are the tabs? What are those tabbies?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, the tabs are going to be included, so you can open it to, like, you know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why didn't you lead with this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, oh, yeah, I know, I should've had you hold this one up, Marisha.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, are we going to somebody else before I talk about my next thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I'm going to say my next--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before she starts juggling and doing fireworks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (clamoring) (water bubbling) (thunder rumbling) (explosion) ♪ Role ♪ ♪ Critical, Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical, Critical Role ♪ ♪ Mighty Nein, Mighty Nein ♪ ♪ Roll the dice, roll the dice ♪ ♪ The adventure begins ♪ ♪ They were always beside you ♪ ♪ Your nerdy best friends ♪ ♪ And the DM to guide you ♪ ♪ And they rise from the flames for the battles ahead ♪ ♪ Villains beware ♪ ♪ 'cause you're about to be dead ♪ ♪ They got magic and flair ♪ ♪ They got falchions and cunning ♪ ♪ They don't see over there ♪ ♪ There's a monster incoming ♪ ♪ Inspiration is waiting ♪ ♪ Rise up, don't think twice ♪ ♪ Put your fate in your hands ♪ ♪ Take a chance, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role (roll the dice) ♪ ♪ Critical Role (roll the dice) ♪ ♪ Can you answer the call? ♪ ♪ Dig in deep in your soul ♪ ♪ As the legend unfolds ♪ ♪ Now it's your turn (your turn, your turn) ♪ ♪ To roll ♪ (flames whooshing) (dragon roaring)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So last we left off: The Mighty Nein, making their way north to Eiselcross--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The energy's already all sorts of weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I take it you're going for the entire hour? Are you going full speed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is the, like, if you're walking in snow, what's your speed you're normally at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But because of his guidance and his knowledge of the space and, honestly, digging a groove through a lot of the snow and ice himself for you to follow in suit, it's pretty easy to get around, comparatively.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah, I think we should just full-onskies as--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter) I'm going to just follow Caleb and Yasha's lead with how fast they go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So a fair amount of distance--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have Dagen with us, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it was Caleb, wasn't it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's whatever we said last game.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you're carrying Caduceus and Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But as you land, you could continue on for a bit, but you're now in the middle of the mountain range, so on foot here is going to be a problem, based on the journey you guys were taking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why would we even bother with that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can only do it once a day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That still gave us a bit of time, and, honestly, if there's going to be a storm hitting, we should probably find a safe place even for the tower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hunker down for an-- Is it dark enough that we should take-- Dagen? Is it dark enough that we should take cover tonight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Looking around, we probably got about, 40 or 50 or so minutes before it gets real pitch."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, let's just lay down stakes here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Find a place where we won't get snowed in in the morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and then in the morning we can Polymorph again and we can get us out of this mountain range at least, so that, you know, we can travel on foot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we poke about a bit until we find something like a crevasse or something sheltered from the elements somewhat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think I found something. Follow me."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of the ice around here looks rough in the snow up there, but there is a smooth concave little alcove.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wand gets jammed into the snow and I take a moment and before long, the door opens we have our home again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If there's anything you wish to do before the night's done, you can speak up. Otherwise, we'll move on to the following day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's like, "Ugh, this might be a problem." Goes ahead and sets down his little, like, glider metal front bits and pushes through, and eventually you guys all manage to exit without an issue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just to have as much fun as possible before it's no longer outside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fifty cats come out of the holes in the walls and just like, (licking) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them gets, like, brain freeze, and is like-- (chokes) (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He had one point. (poofing) (laughter) Oh god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like those ping pong ball mousetraps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are all there, adjusting to the extremely brisk temperature in comparison to where you had slept the night before, Dagen spins around and goes, "So we're taking to the sky again, right? I'm not leading through all this bullshit?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Point of thought, do we want to burn that many spells now, or at the end of the day?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, unfortunately, it's going to ruin the day if we try to get through this mountain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We want to get off of this peak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll burn the spell. It's okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have lots of travel, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not like a gentle snow, it's a heavier snow, but it's not storming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So (wings flapping) eagle time? What're we doing?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(excited laughter)" He seems to be excited at the prospect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't see anything around us, right? Do we want to do a sweep of just the general landscape?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think I had it prepared yesterday, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll assist Caduceus with a sweep of the landscape to make sure everything's clear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a perception with advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By pushing you in that direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing about, and the snowfall does obscure some of your vision, especially beyond about a 60 to 70-foot distance, you do catch on one of the nearby ridges, you glance up and you see like a bit of darker black color, and you focus on it and you see a set of dark eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you glance over and you see it shift out of the direction, and then a little bit over past the next ridge, you can see about five or six wolves that are all circling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're going to-- they're doing the thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have we already become eagles while they're looking?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're surveying the land from above.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should probably get a move on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you can see, immediately where you were, beyond what you can initially see, about 14 wolves had begun to circle where you had arrived, and they all look up as you take off, and you imagine their frustration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel good that at least you've notified them that it's no hard feelings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But nevertheless, pushing on ahead for the next hour of travel, that'll get you another 16 miles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Were we just at the mountains that are-- that the Allowak's Sanctuary is at the foot of? Is that where we were?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allowak's Sanctuary is to the west of this mountain range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, it's west for the sanctuary, and then east for the river, and you either had to choose one path or the other, and you guys decided, "No, fuck it, we'll go over." So that's what you did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we aren't going through yeti village.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are flying in between, taking a straight line shot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're still south of where the flow shift would be on the map.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wouldn't make it all the way to beyond the mountain range, but you will make it towards the decline and the safer region to hike down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Blowing past, he's like, "I think right there's probably the safest place!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You can't see me because you-- Let's go down!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the safest place, right over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guiding you verbally as you guys begin to make your way down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a ship, I love it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any preparation you guys want to do before beginning to descend this side of the mountain range?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long would it have taken to walk this far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This far probably would've taken an additional day of travel, if not a little more."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If the map is any indication, we're roughly just shy of completing a third of our way to A2.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are we getting down the mountain? Are we sledding down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sledding, and wheeling, and then we'll climb down where it's necessary."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we make a big sled or something, for all of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I ain't getting in that shit."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's no, like, trees around here, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, we can paint us a sled?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't have anything to paint on, Nott!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's nowhere near as dense as some of the Empire mountains, and you can see a lot of them are finding nooks and crannies so they're not entirely exposed to the elements and the dangers of the blizzard that would come through and eventually kill them off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there, any, like, rare cold mountain flowers? Growing on a cliff face?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Rocks are the flowers of the mountains.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? You wouldn't be able to recall much for this far north.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was just recalling if there would be anything up here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to look specifically for anything, make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I guide her? I can't guide her, can I? Because I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On this part of the mountain range, you don't really see much in the way of gentle fauna.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm want to make a fucking sled!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to make a sled?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What would we use? Do we have any extra, like, cloaks?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it a sled just for you, or a sled for everybody?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here, you want to sit on my shield?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester's shield, both of their shields are big enough for you to sled on, if you wanted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we have an extra one in the bag of holding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I might have an extra shield.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perfectly good way to endanger ourselves unnecessarily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. You get really fast, believe me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll take your shield.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My kids just watched it a few weeks ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you take the shield and walk up to the edge of the cliff where you saw Dagen's already making his way down, it's steep and rocky with trees.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it's not like a-- I was picturing, like, a gentle slope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're the asshole that walks up with the cooking tray and you're like, "No problem!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's still, on foot, another, like, hour to an hour and a half of travel before you reach the base of the mountain.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So an hour and a half sled ride?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: a four minute sled ride, and whatever remains of you when you get to the bottom...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I think you should go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once we're a safe distance down, it'll be time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now you're making me want to do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if I turn her into a fish first? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hate you so much. Why me? Why is it turned onto me? I was, like, 13 in that headshot, man. 14.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't even know how old I was.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's how old that shit is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can still see the unbroken dreams, it's amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. See all the hope still in my eyes? It's great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They were forged [inaudible] like Fjord's sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a couple moments in the mountainside where a rope has to be affixed, and you all lower yourselves down before tugging or cutting it off, but as you make your way further, there is, at the end of the first hour of travel on foot, a moment where you, Veth, think, dangerously but possibly, there is a sleddable hill to the bottom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there one side that's like-- it's a teardrop shape?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's round, but it's got some grooves, so it'll move in a direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be careful, because when I did it before, my shield is circular, too, and you tend to spin really easy, and then you can get a real good--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Here, I'll hold the back so you can get on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I have, what do I have? Let's see here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have anything that could act as a rudder?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's what I'm looking for, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, this is such a bad idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How dumb do we want to be?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So maybe I could, like, like, use it as like a-- like in Florida.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those wind-- those swamp boats that have, like, the rudder on the back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it's too late now because you begin to tip forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to give her Guidance on the way down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wind had already numbed the edge of your nose and ears just traveling down the side, but now your whole face is numb, your eyes are beginning to water and freeze on the edges, you're just like, "Ah! Ah!" Making your way down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediately, it begins to spin to one side, and you can see there's a cluster of trees heading up your way. What do you do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to-- wait, so if I continue, I'll be sort of flying up and over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an acrobatics check for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you get to add a d4 to that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, don't forget, you also can't roll lower than 10.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because acrobatics, you do have training.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're totally right, so that's a 22.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we be giving chase at all?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, she's going to be down there for a while waiting for us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's just see how this plays out, hold on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turning to the opposite side, you can see there's now a cluster of trees in your path, and you can try and maneuver through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to definitely try to maneuver through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make three acrobatics checks for me, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that mean I get advantage all the time, or what is that? No, that's...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have anything that gives you advantage on acrobatics normally?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until you discover what that is, it doesn't apply to this, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) No, you can't roll lower than a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't roll lower than a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For sure. So that becomes a 10.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So the 14 is a 24, the 14 is a 24, and the 10 is a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are designed for this shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until eventually the trees vanish, and all you see is this what you think is a gradual decline, you're like, "Oh cool," and then you realize it's a fast-approaching cliff edge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's no big deal for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to go ahead and make one more acrobatics check to see if you can land properly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stick that shit, Shaun White, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a higher DC, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's only advantage on escape from being grappled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I still get your Guidance?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want a Veth-shaped hole in the snow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as, in the middle of the air, Veth kicks out the shield a bit, trying to pull some of that Yasha Skingorger snowboarding action, and the shield just fitters out of your grasp.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no! It's just me and a fan. I'm going to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- fan down, see if I can-- (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So from the rest of your perspective, you know that moment where Wile E. Coyote like plummets off the cliff edge and there's just like the cloud?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) Thankfully, it's snow where you impact, so you don't take any damage, but there's a moment where your whole body is just locked in ice cold freezing temperature, and you scramble up about seven feet of snow to get back to a surface, and you survived.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could've suffocated in all that snow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From our height, we just saw, nyoom, pew.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should make sure she's-- we should head down.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we do the same? I don't know, no no no no no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's old hat, he's come across this place, and without issue, you see him make his way down the edge of the mountain, up to the point of the cliff and (whooshing).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lands it without issue, until eventually you see him come to the very base and spin around and then turn back and just go, "Woo!" You hear the voice echo up the side of the mountain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is Veth okay? I shout down to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to set off an avalanche.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, this is the only way down, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here, I'll just fire off my pistol to let you know that I'm okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'll take out Skingorger and get it ready, like, you know, at the top of a ramp and then go down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make, for the purposes of this, two acrobatics checks for me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so, that would be-- Wait, did you say acrobatics or athletics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So for you, it'd probably be athletics.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so first one is a 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have now climbed your way out and are like (panting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you watch as Yasha lands about two feet in front of you and sprays snow back onto your face.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Cover all the snow, you know?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to race him down to the bottom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're both going at the same time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to catamarans, like, try and sit on it and use my staff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, for you, it would be three, because you haven't done this before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm bad at this, this'll be funny.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have, we've sledded, we sledded before on our shields.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That one time at the temple?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That one time that we did it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That doesn't count, does it? All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So first pass for each of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to give myself some Guidance, just in case.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, putting your staff out behind to use like a rudder, you grind past and turn to the left, and you narrowly avoid being smashed into by Jester, who is unable to turn quite as gracefully.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And while you didn't bail from the shield, you do have disadvantage on your next check, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second pass on each of you, roll another athletics or acrobatics.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I know, I did it, it's my advantage roller.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that one's gone. Hold on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you begin to spin around the corner where you saw Veth bank initially, and Yasha use with a little more acumen, it doesn't cause much of an issue, and you barely scoot, you almost glide off the edge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you manage to just barely crest-- which you have just enough of a view as you bank off the side to glance over the side, and it is a sheer rock cliff on the opposite end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you spin by, you watch as Jester cuts you off and is now about three or four feet ahead of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's that friend at go karts? She's that guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I throw a banana peel behind me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably Yasha's, since being larger and a little more, no offense, skilled at this portion of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make one more check for each of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I didn't even guide myself this time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both go, woo! And go into the cluster of trees.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your shield lands over on its side, and both of you are now gently gliding side by side through--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like when you fall on a mogul?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As we're prone, I'm just going to high five him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you slowly make your way towards the cliff now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to dig in for that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hold onto him as he digs in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it's about a 45, 50-foot drop before the next snowbank.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pick up my shield and I guess we'll just--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe we could wait for the others.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That looked so graceful! Nice job!
